sql-select.name: GetDatabaseBackupHistory
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT N'db1' AS [DatabaseName] ,N'D' AS [BackupType] ,CONVERT([DATETIME], N'20131018') AS [BackupFinishDate] ,100.10 AS [DatabaseBackupSizeMB]
UNION ALL
SELECT N'db1' AS [DatabaseName] ,N'D' AS [BackupType] ,CONVERT([DATETIME], N'20131017') AS [BackupFinishDate] ,95.50 AS [DatabaseBackupSizeMB]
UNION ALL
SELECT N'db2' AS [DatabaseName] ,N'D' AS [BackupType] ,CONVERT([DATETIME], N'20131018') AS [BackupFinishDate] ,50.50 AS [DatabaseBackupSizeMB]
;
